response.overview: In 2014 in St. Petersburg, a group of young artists presented a performance dedicated to the issue of translation and conversion of contemporary poetry at the Manifesta 10 parallel events biennale. The performance was filmed on several cameras of different formats. Subsequently, all the material was lost, but in 2018 an anthropologically filmed version of the events was found, digitized from a VHS camera. Without sound. The found video was reinterpreted through artistic editing. Thus, the participating artists became the characters of a new story.
response.title: Translator
